name: Trip To Leh Ladakh By Air (23rd – 29th June 2014)
description:
Overview
A unique Trip To Leh Ladakh that takes you to the heart of Buddhist ladakh to witness mother nature up close and personal. This Trip To Leh Ladakh makes you cross the highest motorable roads on earth, camp right beside the Pangong Lake as you soak every bit of the serene beauty in your heart. Life indeed is great…!!!
Places Covered: Leh, Pangong Tso, Nubra Valley, Hemis Festival, Kalachakra
